channel.title: Comments on: RETRO: The Stone Roses “Elephant Stone” live in Blackpool 1989

item.title: By: Adam O
item.dc:creator: Adam O
item.description: Wow, half the punters in the crowd coulda sung that better. Can't believe Ian subsequently managed to have enough of a solo career to merit a best-of, but that's the music biz for you.
item.content:encoded: Wow, half the punters in the crowd coulda sung that better. Can’t believe Ian subsequently managed to have enough of a solo career to merit a best-of, but that’s the music biz for you.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Nothing ruins a show for me more than off-key/out of tune singing. It's like finger nails on the blackboard. I would have pulled my hair out at that show.
item.content:encoded: Nothing ruins a show for me more than off-key/out of tune singing. It’s like finger nails on the blackboard. I would have pulled my hair out at that show.
